text:
Hi! This time I took a look at R.app which is GUI for R, specific to Mac OS. I discussed a few possible fixes the app needs with Simon Urbanek on the R Dev Days. Here is my first PR, which I’ve sent to app’s GitHub: <https://github.com/R-macos/Mac-GUI/pull/16>

Should I also put a PR in bugzilla to draw Simon’s attention?

I wanted to play with R.app more but I also noticed that although open sourced it’s not under GPL or any other specific license.
